ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: K.C. gratefully acknowledges financial support from the Alexander von Humboldt Foundation. The simulation work was supported by the IT center of RWTH Aachen University under the JARA‐HPC grant JARA0179. We thank the NWO and beamline DUBBLE at ESRF, Grenoble (France) for providing beamtime, and in particular Dr. Alessandro Longo for technical advice on beamline operation. This work was supported by the public grant ANR‐10‐LABX‐76‐01 (Labex STOREX) overseen by the French National Research Agency (ANR) as part of the “Investissements d'Avenir” program. Alistore‐ERI is warmly thanked for financing the PhD grant of J.J.A. and the post‐doc grant of M.F.
